especially if you consider the person that you're looking at it.

translation.en: [Stevie] Black people as extraordinary and normal
Kind of shit that keeps me up at night.
I got it in Cote d'Ivoire.
-Nice to meet you. -Very nice to meet you.

こんなに大盛況でびっくりよ シナイ　アイゼイアだ

now you're going to have to commit yourself 100% to the work.

Yeah, you look like you're coolin'.
-Yeah, I'm chillin'. -I see you. I see you. Looking for something. Nah, I'm kidding.

No, I ain't see him. Where he at?

translation.ja: どこかな　遅れるのかも
どこかな　遅れるのかも 遅れるって お仕事で？

そうだろ　よかった

Just make sure your ass have a good time

translation.en: -Good to see you. -I got the bottles

I'm so glad you made it.

バッグも靴もいい 交換しちゃう？

translation.ja: アイゼイア スティーヴィーよ 同じハワード大学だった

It's our second time meeting, but I guess, something like that.

translation.ja: そうね　持ってくる
君のも ありがとう

-Nick's a good guy. -[Nick] Um, okay. Okay.

translation.en: Okay. So, uh, to right now.

translation.en: [man] Check, check one, two. Yo, yo. How y'all doing tonight?

translation.en: Oh, come on, Get Down-- y'all can make more noise than that. How are y'all doing tonight?

translation.en: [Nick] So if you don't know, uh, my name is Nick
and I'm the owner of this here establishment
-and this is the Get Down. -I'm gonna--
Oh, okay. See you in a bit.
[Nick] --some of that good old DC flavor right now.

今夜は 昔ながらの音楽を… ゴーゴーは詳しい？

translation.en: Yo, TOB, crank that shit, man.
Shit, I mean, we're all artists as far as I'm concerned.

translation.en: I don't have an artistic bone in my body.
translation.ja: 私は芸術のセンスがない

translation.en: Eh, I find that hard to believe.
Folk make you feel like art supposed to be
translation.ja: アートは高尚だと 思われがちだが

translation.en: some lofty shit but, Black people
translation.ja: アートは高尚だと 思われがちだが 黒人は“無”から生み出す

translation.en: create shit out of nothing every day.
translation.ja: 黒人は“無”から生み出す

translation.en: And if that ain't art, then, I don't know what is.

translation.en: -Come on, man, you know. -[laughs] -Like, what do you do? -Okay.

translation.en: Okay well, I just, um, transferred to Georgetown Law.

ジョージタウンの学生か

translation.en: So, how did you get a name like Stevie?
My mom. She named me after Stevie Wonder.
translation.ja: 母がスティーヴィー･ ワンダーから名付けた

translation.en: Yeah, my mom saw him in concert in Rotterdam when she was eight months pregnant with me.
translation.ja: 母がロッテルダムで 彼のライブに行ったら

translation.en: She said I was so excited that I danced the entire time.
translation.ja: おなかの中で ずっと私が踊ってたって

translation.en: My folks just picked their favorite name out the Bible and, uh, you know…
translation.ja: 俺の親は 聖書から 名前を付けただけ

translation.en: I lived there until I was 16.

translation.ja: そうか でも両親も祖父母も みんなＤ.Ｃ.出身

translation.en: my grandparents, my whole family, everyone's from DC.
translation.ja: でも両親も祖父母も みんなＤ.Ｃ.出身

translation.en: Look I'm just asking, you know, people try and lump DC
translation.ja: でも ごちゃまぜにされる Ｄ.Ｃ.もメリーランドも バージニアもさ

translation.en: and Maryland and Virginia all together but, you know.
translation.ja: Ｄ.Ｃ.もメリーランドも バージニアもさ

translation.en: I know you're busy with law school and everything

translation.en: but, if you ever wanna pause for a moment…
translation.ja: 学校とか いろいろ忙しいよね でも息抜きに―

translation.en: maybe we could do this again.

translation.ja: スティーヴィー･ リッチモンドか

translation.en: [Claudette] But I like the design though. The design was really nice.

translation.ja: でも正面しか見えなかったわ

translation.en: [Mr. Maxwell] Reverend Raleigh put his foot in that sermon
translation.ja: 今朝の説教は熱かった

translation.en: -this morning, didn't he? -I would've enjoyed it more
translation.ja: 今朝の説教は熱かった ヘレンの帽子のせいで 気が散ったわ

translation.en: if Helen's hat wasn't in the way.
translation.ja: ヘレンの帽子のせいで 気が散ったわ

translation.en: Can't go one day without talking 'bout folk?
Oh, hush. I wasn't talking about her. I was talking about her hat.
translation.ja: やめて　ヘレンじゃなく 帽子の話よ

translation.en: [Mr. Maxwell] Junior, you apply for that job yet, son?

何の？ ディーコンが薦めた

translation.en: Thought I said I wasn't applying.
Junior, are you still selling sperm?
translation.ja: まだ精子を売ってるの？

translation.en: [Mrs. Maxwell] The deacon says that job pays real good, Isaiah.
translation.ja: ディーコンは高給職だと

translation.en: You could finally start tithing, find a nice apartment.
translation.ja: 寄付も引っ越しもできる

translation.en: [Mr. Maxwell] I'm still trying to figure out
translation.ja: 画家が家族を養えるか？

translation.en: how you're gonna support a family with these paintings.
translation.ja: 画家が家族を養えるか？ 職業とは言えない

translation.en: -can you let him get a woman first? -I…
Let me find out you like being broke.
I mean, you're giving me all this free coffee.
translation.ja: 目当ては無料のコーヒー

translation.en: [Mecca] Well, listen though, I'm taking donations.
translation.ja: 寄付なら いつでも
寄付なら いつでも また今度ね　今日もステキ
また今度ね　今日もステキ

translation.en: Is this from the same farm… or, a different one?
This is actually from a different farm.
translation.ja: 実を言うと違う農園なの

translation.en: It's one of the oldest coffee beans still produced in Ethiopia.
translation.ja: エチオピア産の 歴史あるコーヒー豆の１つよ

translation.en: So tell me, what--what's going on? What are you working on?
translation.ja: 最近は どうしてるの？

translation.en: I mean, it's like I enjoy what I'm doing at the firm.
translation.ja: 法律事務所での仕事は楽しい

translation.en: [Stevie] But I just don't know if I wanna be this big shot lawyer -at a big firm, you know. -[Mecca] Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: でも大手に勤めたいのか 分からない

translation.en: And my dad thinks that those big firms will give me the leverage I'll need later.
translation.ja: 父さんは大手が 将来的に私の助けになると

translation.en: I am literally my parents' worst nightmare.
translation.ja: 両親にとって悪夢そのもの

translation.en: I've got multiple degrees to pour people's coffee.
translation.ja: コーヒー店で 学位を無駄にしてる

translation.en: Yes, I am. You're right. I am. I'm doing it.
translation.ja: そうよ　好きでやってる

translation.en: You know, I saw the way -Isaiah was looking at you. -Girl, stop.
translation.ja: アイゼイアの あなたを見る目は…

translation.en: I don't--I don't have time -for much of anything right now. -[Mecca] Okay.
translation.ja: 今は恋愛どころじゃない

translation.en: Look at how I'm spending my weekends.
He asked me on a date.

translation.ja: ただの… いいじゃない

translation.en: I mean, it's just a date.

translation.ja: そうね　どうなるか…

translation.en: -[Mecca] We'll see what… -Stop. Don't do that.
That's--I didn't-- I didn't do anything. That's…
Be careful. This is my mortgage for the next year.
translation.ja: 慎重にな 来年の住宅ローンに充てる
何だか すごそうだ

translation.en: Yo, you finished that fucker for the show yet?
Your ass need to get inspired.
Hey, tell me where you get it from.
Well, it depends on the piece.
You know, it's been a bit of everything, you know,
translation.ja: 言ってみれば何でもありだ

translation.en: from uh women to motherfuckers on the corner,
translation.ja: 言ってみれば何でもありだ 女性からキューバの建築まで
女性からキューバの建築まで

translation.en: to watching ducks in the park.
You know, the best shit come from living. You know, you can't be holed up in a dark-ass room all day
translation.ja: １日中 部屋に 閉じこもってたら

translation.en: and expect the motherfucking muse to just show up for free.
No, she a hungry bitch and she need to be fed that good shit.
translation.ja: 感性は干ぼし　刺激が必要だ

translation.en: Now, look, what your ass need to do,
is separate your studio from your living space.
translation.ja: アトリエと住居を分けろ

translation.en: That's when you're gonna become the artist you wanna be.
translation.ja: 理想のアーティストになれる

translation.en: Hey, call it what you want.
If you don't learn shit else from me,
always remember to keep at least one piece for yourself from every show.
translation.ja: どの展覧会でも １作品は手元に残せ

translation.en: Because motherfucker, you got to own your own shit.
translation.ja: だって自分の作品だろ

translation.en: I ain't think about it like that.
[Stevie] A recent report by the DC Fair Housing Institute
translation.ja: 公正住宅協会の報告によると

translation.en: reveals that housing costs are often between 50% and 80% of the income
translation.ja: 所得の50～80％が 住居費に消える家庭が多い
これが貧困地区の実態

translation.en: who are almost completely Black and Latino.
translation.ja: 大半は黒人とラテン系です

translation.en: The current housing protection laws are flawed
translation.ja: 現行の住宅法には不備があり

translation.en: and no longer serve the people they were intended to protect.
translation.ja: 守られるべき人の 役に立ちません

translation.en: I'm not sure this is a civil rights issue.
Can you actually prove patterns of discrimination?
translation.ja: 差別のパターンを 立証できるか？

translation.en: What's happening in DC right now
is the result of legacy housing discrimination in this country.
translation.ja: この国における 住宅差別の遺産です

translation.en: It's exactly one of the reasons
why the Fair Housing Act of 1968 was enacted in the first place.
translation.ja: 1968年に公正住宅法が 制定されました

translation.en: While the discrimination may not be blatantly based on race,
translation.ja: しかし表向きは 人種差別がなくなっても

translation.en: which is, again, in this country, tied to race.
translation.ja: すなわち人種に関係します

translation.en: Quite the setup you got here.
You know? I like to spoil the ladies.
translation.ja: 女性を甘やかすのが 好きなんだ

translation.en: -Hmm. Do you now? -Hold on, hold on. More wine?
translation.ja: そうなの？ もっとワインは？

translation.en: Yes, please. Oh, hold on. Wait.
[Isaiah] I love it out here right now.
[Stevie] So this is where all the magic happens.
translation.ja: ここで魔法が起きるのね

translation.en: I mean, I guess you could say that.
I actually just picked that one up from my mom's house.
[Isaiah] No. I still need to fill in
translation.ja: シャツを 細部まで描かないとね

translation.en: some details on his shirt, background.
translation.ja: シャツを 細部まで描かないとね 背景も

translation.en: I haven't shown anybody that one yet.
Kind of reminds me of Noah Davis's work.
translation.ja: ノア･デイヴィスを思い出す

translation.en: That's one of my favorite artists.
-Wow. -He always talks about spirituality being the driving force behind his paintings
translation.ja: いつも彼が話題にするのは 絵の原動力となる精神性

translation.en: and how uncomfortable it makes people.
translation.ja: ひどく心地が悪いものだって

translation.en: Now if my work could even come remotely close
translation.ja: 俺の作品が― そういう話を 引き起こす域に近づけたら

translation.en: to evoking that kind of conversation,
translation.ja: そういう話を 引き起こす域に近づけたら

translation.en: So how do you know when a painting is finished?
translation.ja: 絵が完成したって分かるの？

translation.en: How do you know when you're making love to someone?
translation.ja: 誰かと寝るって分かるか？

translation.en: [Stevie] Hey. I just received a package with a painting.
translation.ja: さっき荷物が届いて 絵を受け取った

translation.en: Would you know anything about that? There's no return address.
translation.ja: 気づいてる？ 差出人が書いてない

translation.en: You got admirers sending you art, huh?
All right. I might need to step my game up.
translation.ja: 俺の絵は まだまだかもな

translation.en: Mmm, I think your game is pretty strong.
Will you come hang it for me?
translation.ja: よかったら 壁に掛けて

translation.en: So where do you want me to put it?

translation.ja: 考えてたのは ここだけど どう？

translation.en: All depends how you wanna interact with it,
want it to put a smile on your face when you walk in the door,
translation.ja: ドアを開けた時 笑顔になりたいとか
“何か”を 思い出したいとかね

translation.en: How about this spot right here?
Nah, nah, nah. No. No. No.
translation.ja: おい ウソだろ ありえない

translation.en: Yo, I've known Young for God knows how long, right?
translation.ja: アイゼイアのことは 昔から知ってるが

translation.en: He's never cleaned a crab for nobody, not even his mother.
translation.ja: 母親にもカニをむかなかった

translation.en: See, she used to eating crab cake, so you know, I have to help her out.
translation.ja: スティーヴィーは むけないから

translation.en: That's not true. That's not true.
The female crabs taste sweeter. That's facts.
translation.ja: カニは雌のほうが甘い

translation.en: Okay. Yeah. Sure. That makes sense though, right?
translation.ja: なるほど それなら分かる

translation.en: Because women are just better in general. -Ah, shit. Here we go. -Thank you. Thank you.
translation.ja: 概して女性が優秀だから

translation.en: -Here we go. I ain't say all that. -It's true.
I mean, truthfully speaking, if we are speaking truthfully…
Come on, bro. Why are you trying to show me up?

translation.ja: あなたは もっと好き

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. Yeah. Yeah, I got it. Got it.
translation.ja: もういい　分かったよ

translation.en: Why are we painting the living room again?
Because your mother watches too much HGTV.
translation.ja: 母さんが リフォーム番組を見て

translation.en: Hey, how is that job search going anyway?
I'm actually about to get representation soon.
translation.ja: 実は 絵を出品する

translation.en: Means I'm gonna have somebody to sell my work.
Probably get a solo show, too, soon.
translation.ja: 個展も開けるかも だから…

translation.en: What's up, baby? -Appreciate you. -Of course. Of course.
translation.ja: 来たのか　ありがとう

translation.en: Well, it's good to see you again.
translation.ja: いいんだ ステキよ　それ好き
ステキよ　それ好き

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. -Of course. Of course.
Young, this is a fucking masterpiece.
Yo. You're about to blow up.
Okay. Isaiah, Stevie, come on. -Smile. -[Isaiah] All right.
Hey, let's get one by the banner.
-Look at that. Look at that. -There it is…

translation.ja: すみません 楽しんでる？

translation.en: I'm having a lot of fun. How about you?

translation.ja: 調子は？ まあ 悪くないよ

translation.en: Uh, this is, uh, Stevie, my girlfriend, and, uh, this is Adam.
translation.ja: 彼女のスティーヴィーだ こっちはアダム

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you, too.
Me and Adam went to MICA together.
So what have you been up to, man? You with a gallery?
translation.ja: それで画廊は付いてるのか？

translation.en: Are you a painter as well?
Yeah, but not nearly as good as this guy.
translation.ja: この男には負けるけどね

translation.en: -[Isaiah] Ah. -[Adam] He was a rock star -in school. -[chuckles]
Oh, if you're in New York next month, I'm having my next solo show at the Sena,
translation.ja: 来月 ニューヨークで 僕の個展があるんだ

translation.en: spent six months in Rome getting ready for it.
translation.ja: 半年間 ローマで準備した

translation.en: Would love to have you at the opening.
That's great, man. Honestly, um, congrats.
translation.ja: すごいな　本当におめでとう

translation.en: I would kill to be in one of Chenai's shows, though.
[sighs] Loved your piece. Again, it was very nice to meet you.
translation.ja: いい作品だ　会えてよかった

translation.en: -Take it easy, man. -Nice to meet you.
I'm gonna talk to Chenai real quick.

translation.ja: 来てくれてありがとう やめて

translation.en: I think you can do better.
You called me your girlfriend in there.
Chenai doesn't think I'm ready for my solo show.
translation.ja: シナイは まだ個展は早いと

translation.en: She don't think I quite figured out what it is I wanna say.
translation.ja: 何を言いたいのか 自分で分かってないって

translation.en: Do you not think you have something to say?
Then you have to show her.
Yeah. I'm gonna spend the night.
You think we're ready for that?
I mean, we spend nearly every night together.
translation.ja: 毎晩 一緒に 過ごすってだけよ

translation.en: You can work at the studio.
Let me guess, White boys you went to school with, they already on their second, third solo?
translation.ja: 白人の同級生たちが 何回も開いてるから？
まあな ずるいよな

translation.en: How much better are you than them?
Do the powers that be know that?
Motherfucker, they ain't gonna know it until you make them.
translation.ja: 甘いな　お前が知らしめろ

translation.en: And when you do, just better be ready to create,
and I ain't talking that good shit neither, I'm talking that epic shit.
translation.ja: 佳作じゃなく傑作のな

translation.en: Look, it don't matter that you're better than your classmates.
You can't be just better, right?
You, you gotta be a fucking unicorn.
translation.ja: 唯一無二の存在になれ

translation.en: I just learned how to shapeshift.
[Stevie] Sometimes I wonder if getting a law degree
translation.ja: 時々 思うの 法律の学位は 本当に必要かって
法律の学位は 本当に必要かって

translation.en: But, like, it just makes you 10 times more incredible at what you already do.
translation.ja: でも あれば 10倍の影響力を持つ

translation.en: [Stevie] I just wanna be more like you sometimes.
translation.ja: 時々 あなたに憧れる

translation.en: [Stevie] Bold in your opinions, your work.
translation.ja: 考えが大胆だから 作品も

translation.en: Sometimes I feel like my work isn't enough.
translation.ja: 時々 作品に満足できない

translation.en: To express my ideas without having to explain them
translation.ja: 説明しなくても伝わる作品

translation.en: to anyone, not making any sort of statement
translation.ja: 説明しなくても伝わる作品 何も主張せずに

All right. I'm almost done so just give me a second.

Of course, I still feel something.

translation.en: Once upon a time, before your father,
I was seeing a young man.
But it became very clear he wasn't ready for me,

私は… 彼を待つか それとも前に進むか
